entries.@contamination_anomalies_descr: Anomalies that burst with contamination if you don't destroy them beforehand.
entries.@expedition_2_briefing:
Your main goal is to gather Crystalline samples and valuable pieces of data. These can be located on the map by probing the surroundings with Environment Scanners.
In order to request supplies, a certain amount of resources is required. The more resources you have at hand when you extract, the more XP you will receive.
entries.@crystalline_interference_descr: Abilities charge slower. Destroy anomalies to recharge. Other players also get a share.
entries.@infinite_contamination_descr: Each contamination level after 5 reduces your max health by 20.
entries.@immunity_breach_descr: Operatives' immunity has been compromised. Regeneration rate is dramatically reduced.
entries.@condensed_life_force_descr: Fallen enemies drop Life Cells that briefly intensify regeneration upon pickup.
entries.@extreme_expedition_mod_descr: Enemies are tougher and more agressive. Precision damage to enemies is increased.
entries.@initial_contamination_descr: You start with 2 levels of Contamination.
entries.@bodybuilder_mod_descr: Health Cap grows when defeating an enemy depending on perk type. Resets on death. You start with a Sidearm Bodybuilder perk.
entries.@corrupted_vitality_descr: You start with 2/3 of your max health.
entries.@hp_cap_decreased_message: YOUR MAXIMUM HEALTH IS REDUCED BY 20
